About Me

As a dedicated Software Developer with experience in ASP.NET Core, MVC, and Web API, I specialize in creating efficient and scalable web solutions. My background includes developing enterprise-level applications, rebuilding legacy systems, and working on real-time data integration projects. I am passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and leveraging technology to solve complex problems.

My expertise spans full-stack development, with a strong command of C#, .NET technologies, SQL databases, and modern frontend frameworks. I am also gaining experience in Cloud & Data Engineering with Azure Data Factory and Databricks.
